post.summary: Adding an item into the cart
post.description: We are creating a user's cart when he is signing up, after which user can add items to cart.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: access token generated via the login.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: item id(the dish item id) from restaurant's dish items.

parameters.name: selected_quantity
parameters.description: How much quantity of the food item, you want to add.

parameters.name: item_total_price
parameters.description: total price of the item(after calculations from frontend)

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: access token generated via the login. (user)

parameters.name: cart_item_id
parameters.description: This id is created when you add item to cart, inside items_in_cart array, a new _id is created with each item.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: access token generated via the login.

parameters.name: food_type
parameters.description: food_type of the Restaurant ex:- veg, non-veg, sda-hua , bdhiya

parameters.name: working_hours
parameters.description: Working hours of the Restaurant eg :- [ { 'day' : 'Monday' , start_time : '12:00' , end_time : '23:00' , is_holyday : false } ]

parameters.name: service_type
parameters.description: service_type of the Restaurant ex: //1 delivery //2 self pickup //3 both

parameters.name: bank_detail
parameters.description: Working hours of the Restaurant eg :- { 'bank_name' : 'SBI'  , 'account_holder_name' : 'Ayush' ,'account_number' : '34234' , 'ifsc':'SBUOSIJ' }
